Content.Text:
<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, hey, <MYNAME>! Did you come out to see
me? Hee hee. That's awesome!
<PAGE>
So, um... I've got something I want to talk to
you about.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Here, um, isn't really the best place, though.
Come with me a sec, will ya?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_R>See, um, lately I've found myself thinking about
you a whole lot.
<PAGE>
I'll see stuff and be like, "<MYNAME> would love
that," or "I bet <MYNAME> would get a smile
from that." And, um...I, uh...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGRY>AUGH! I'm in love with you, okay?!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
<MYNAME>! Will you please go ouWPH MIPH?!
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_DISCOURAGEMENT_R><FACE_LOSS>Geh! Maaan... I can't believe I bit my tongue!
After I practiced saying it so many times, too!
Aaaaugh!
Yes. I'll go out with you.
I'm sorry...

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>Huh? You will? Really?! YESSS! Thanks,
<MYNAME>!
<PAGE>
But since I messed it up, I wanna try saying it
again. Properly, this time.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL><MYNAME>, I'm in love with you. I'd be honored
if you would go out with me.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE><ACTION_RIBBON>Heehee! I'm looking forward to being with you
more. This is going to be so awesome!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, hey! I know! Since we're dating and all now,
how about we give each other new nicknames?
Wouldn't that be fun? ♪
<PAGE>
You can call me Fritzie-poo or Darling or
Honeybunch or whatever you want!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>But then the question is, what should I call you?
Let's keep it the same as always.
Let's see...

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So you want me to call you <BLUE><MYNAME></BLUE> now?
Yes

<CANCEL_SELECT>
No

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Gotcha! Man, I'm really looking forward to this,
<MYNAME>!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Heck, why waste time? Let's go on a date right
n--
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>GAH! That's right! I've got stuff to do. Maaaan, I
don't wanna...but I'd better head home and do it
anyway.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Next time, though! Next time, I swear we'll go on
the awesomest date ever! Okay? Okay! See ya,
<MYNAME>!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
O-oh... Okay. N-no, it's all right. I'm kinda used
to being turned down. I'll be fine! Don't worry
about it!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
But it'd really suck if we, like, avoided each other
now, so can we go back to being friends?
...Thanksbye!

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello, <MYNAME>. Did you come to see me?
Ah, I'm glad to hear that.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>In fact, I was just thinking of going to see you
myself.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
You see, there is something I'd like to talk to you
about. Here is not the best of places, though.
May we go elsewhere?

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've been struggling quite a bit with myself over
whether to say this or not, but now I've finally
made up my mind.
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_R><FACE_LAUGH>I know this may seem out of the blue, but bear
with me. <MYNAME>...I'm in love with you.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_R>At first, I thought I wanted to watch over you as
an elder brother would. But as time went by...
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>...I wanted to be more than that to you. And
yes, there is our age gap to consider, but that
gap means nothing to my feelings.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>If you don't feel the same for me, that's quite all
right. But if you do...and if my age is a
concern...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Then I promise you I will treat you so well and
make you so happy you will forget about it
entirely.
<PAGE>
So if you do have feelings for me, I would be
honored to be your man. I say it again...I am in
love with you, <MYNAME>.
Then let's be together.
I'm sorry...

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_R><ACTION_RIBBON>Thank you, <MYNAME>. You will never regret
choosing me. I promise.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Well, this being a special occasion, what say we
give ourselves new nicknames to denote our
new relationship?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Personally, I'd rather stay away from anything
tasteless or overly formal. I'd be happy if you
simply called me Klaus.
<PAGE>
But it's all entirely your decision. What would
you like me to call you?
Let's keep it the same.
I wanna change my name.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You are all right with me calling you
<BLUE><MYNAME></BLUE>?
Yes

<CANCEL_SELECT>
No

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<MYNAME> it is, then. I am very much looking
forward to us taking our relationship another
step forward.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now then, I would love nothing more than to
stay and chat with you, but I'm afraid there are
things I need to see to.
<PAGE>
I will have to be going, then. I'll see you later,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Ah. I see. No, no. Thank you for making it a
clean break, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well then, I'd best be off. Take care,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow. The second I start to think, hey, it sure
would be nice to see <MYNAME>...suddenly,
there you are!

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've got something I want to talk to you about.
Something important, so...here's not the best
spot. Let's go somewhere else.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_R><MYNAME>... Recently, I've come to realize that
I've been thinking about you almost non-stop.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I'll wonder what you're up to, or if you'd like to
come try my new recipe...stuff like that.
<PAGE>
And suddenly, it hit me.
<PAGE>
I couldn't tell you when it happened, exactly,
but...I've fallen in love with you.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_R><MYNAME>... I want you to go out with me.
Will you?
Yes. I'll go out with you.
I'm sorry...

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_R>Thanks, <MYNAME>. I swear I'll take great care
of you. Man, I'm looking forward to this already!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
...Since this is a big occasion and all, how
about we give ourselves new nicknames? You
can call me whatever you want. I won't mind.
<PAGE>
Now, the question is, what shall I call you?
Same as ever works for me.
Let's see...

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So, <BLUE><MYNAME></BLUE>, then?
Yes

<CANCEL_SELECT>
No

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Got it. I'm really looking forward to this,
<MYNAME>!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Now, I'd love to hang out and chat with you for
a while longer, but I've got things to take care
of.
<PAGE>
So I'm afraid I'll need to get going. But I will
most assuredly see you soon, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Oh...okay. Well, uh, forget I said anything, then.
Sorry to spring such a weird surprise on you.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I'll be going now. Bye!

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hello, <MYNAME>. What is it? Have you come
to see me?
<PAGE>
Or could you somehow tell that I have
something I want to discuss with you?

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Yes, there is something very important I would
like to talk about.
<PAGE>
Here isn't the most appropriate of places,
however. Let's go somewhere else. Please,
come with me.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_PATI>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_R>Beating around the bush will just lead to
misunderstandings, so let me be direct.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL><MYNAME>, I am in love with you.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_R>I don't think I could stand seeing you date
someone else. I can barely tolerate even the
thought of it!
<PAGE>
So...would you go out with me? Please, allow
me the privilege of keeping you to myself.
Yes. I'll go out with you.
I'm sorry...

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_R><ACTION_RIBBON>Thank you, <MYNAME>. I promise I will treat
you more preciously than anyone...or anything
in the world.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<ACTION_RIBBON>We are hereby officially lovers. I will never let
you go now, even if you want me to. That, my
dear, is how this works.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Ah, I know! As this is a special occasion,
perhaps we should give one another new
nicknames.
<PAGE>
I'm sure that will help the reality of this
wonderful new arrangement sink in all the faster.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>What would you like me to call you? Have you
anything in particular in mind?
Let's keep it the same as always.
Let's see...

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So, <BLUE><MYNAME></BLUE>, then?
Yes

<CANCEL_SELECT>
No

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
All right. From now on, I will call you
<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
Goodness. I must admit, using our lovers'
names deliberately like this does feel a
bit...ticklish. But I can't deny it's a good feeling.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Oh, drat! Look at the time. There are duties I
must attend to, I'm afraid.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I'd much rather stay with you right now,
but...such is life. I will see you later,
<MYNAME>!

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Oh...I see.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>No, no, it's all right! Please don't give me that
sad look. You are so much more beautiful when
you smile.
<PAGE>
I'm sorry for springing such an awkward subject
on you so suddenly. Please just forget this
whole conversation ever happened.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now, then, if you will pardon me, I must be
going. Good-bye, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Geez, do you always have to pop up out of the
woodwork like that? And how'd you know to get
here right when I finally made up my mind?!

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Er...by which I mean, we need to talk. I wasn't
expecting to do this so soon, but hey, an
opportunity's an opportunity, right?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Here isn't the best place, though. C'mon. Follow
me.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT>
<MYNAME>, I've realized that...well, that I don't
mind hanging out with you. In fact, I like it. A
lot.
<PAGE>
At first, I had no idea why you kept bothering to
come see me so much...
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>But then I started to notice that I was
actually...anticipating your arrival every time.
And that's when it hit me.
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_R><FACE_NORMAL><MYNAME>... I'm in love with you.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_R>I want you to go out with me and, um...b-be my
girlfriend.
Yes. I'll go out with you.
I'm sorry...

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_R><ACTION_RIBBON>R-really? You will?! Wow. I-I'm really, really
happy right now. Thanks, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Huh? Nicknames? What about 'em?
<PAGE>
Well, whatever. If you want to change what we
call each other, that's fine by me.
<PAGE>
Just don't make it anything weird, okay?
Let's just keep it the same.
Let's see...

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You're okay with <BLUE><MYNAME></BLUE>?
Yes

<CANCEL_SELECT>
No

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Okay. <MYNAME> it is.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I, uh... I'm looking forward to us being,
um...you know...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Man, I'm really not cut out for this kind of thing!

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Anyway, I've got to get going. See ya,
<MYNAME>!

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Oh. Okay. Sorry to bug you with something
so...awkward. Forget I said anything.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I'd better get going. See ya, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, hey <MYNAME>. Your timing is perfect.
There's something I need to talk to you about.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Um, I'd rather it not be here, though. Could you
come with me a sec? Let's go somewhere else.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Okay, um...where to start?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>There's so much I want to say, but it's hard to
find the words for it. Let me just say the most
important part...
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_R><FACE_NORMAL><MYNAME>...I'm in love with you.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_R>Sorry. That probably came as a shock, springing
out of the blue like that, but I've wanted to say it
for a while.
<PAGE>
Will you go out with me?
Yes. I'll go out with you.
I'm sorry...

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_R><ACTION_RIBBON>Thank you, <MYNAME>. You have no idea how
happy you've made me. I'll take good care of
you, I promise.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, I know. Since this is a big event for both of
us, how about we give each other new
nicknames to commemorate it?
<PAGE>
You can call me whatever you'd like. I don't
mind.
<PAGE>
What would you like me to call you?
Let's keep it the same.
I wanna change my name.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You want me to call you <BLUE><MYNAME></BLUE>, then?
Yes

<CANCEL_SELECT>
No

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Okay. So, um...<MYNAME>...I'm honored that
you want to be with me.
<PAGE>
I'm really looking forward to this...especially
being together with you even more.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Umm...oh yeah. I've got stuff I need to get done,
so I'd better get going.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>See you later, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Oh. Okay. Sorry for the big surprise. Forget I said
anything.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'll be going, then. See you.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
My, have you come to visit me? How
gentlemanly of you. And your timing is
impeccable.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I have something I would like to speak to you
about.
<PAGE>
Here is not the appropriate place, so shall we go
somewhere else? Come with me.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_R><MYNAME>...? Is there anyone that you,
erm...fancy?
<PAGE>
There is for me. Someone nosy, but quite kind.
Responsible, yet somehow clueless. I'm very
fond of this person.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Ohohoho! Who could it be, you ask? I'm
speaking of you, <MYNAME>. I say to you now
that I am in love with you.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_R>Will you be my sweetheart?
Yes. I'll go out with you.
I'm sorry...

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>W-well of course you will! No one in their right
mind would turn down a confession from
someone like me!
<PAGE>
<ACTION_RIBBON>Thank you, <MYNAME>. I'm looking forward to
our new relationship.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
There. Now the two of us are officially attached.
Hm...though even saying it aloud doesn't make it
feel any less like a dream.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Oh, I know! Let's give ourselves new nicknames.
I will be gracious and listen to what suggestions
you may have.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Now then, what would you like me to call you?
Let's keep it the same.
I wanna change my name.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So you prefer <BLUE><MYNAME></BLUE>?
Yes

<CANCEL_SELECT>
No

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
All right. <MYNAME> it is.
<PAGE>
As we are now sweethearts, I will expect you to
treat me even more wonderfully than you have
been.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I, too, will treat you even more preciously, so
that you can fall even more in love with me.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
A-anyway! There are matters in need of my
attention, so I must be going!
<PAGE>
Have a lovely day, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
...Oh. N-no, I am not upset! Why would I be
upset? This is your mistake, not mine!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>After all, you have just turned down the most
splendid and elegant lady in the whole town!
<PAGE>
It's only natural that you regret it!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Now then, I have business to attend to, so I
must be off. Goodbye.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
My, my! Are you here to visit me? How nice!
<PAGE>
In fact, I was just on my way to go see you.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Why? Glad you asked. I'll tell you, but not here.
Let's go somewhere more appropriate. Follow
me.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_R><MYNAME>...? Do you think you could ever fall
in love with an older woman?
<PAGE>
If so, do you think you might, er...try dating
me?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_R>There are so many things that I can give you and
teach you, being older. You'd never regret it.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I'm sorry. That was hardly the right way to put it.
Let me be more clear.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I'm in love with you, <MYNAME>. I want to be
with you.
I want to be with you too.
I'm sorry...

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_R><ACTION_RIBBON>Thank you, <MYNAME>. You have no idea how
happy this makes me.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I'm already looking forward to exploring this new
relationship with you.
<PAGE>
Oh, I know. Why don't we give ourselves new
nicknames to commemorate the occasion?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>We're a couple now. I like the idea of calling you
by a new, special name that's just between us.
Let's keep it the same.
I wanna change my name.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You'd like me to call you <BLUE><MYNAME></BLUE>?
Yes

<CANCEL_SELECT>
No

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<MYNAME>. Hee hee! I have to admit, I feel a
little giddy, saying that name out loud.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh goodness, look at the time. I'm so sorry, I
need to get back home.
<PAGE>
Let's be sure to set aside some time for a proper
date in the near future, though. I can hardly
wait. See you later!

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Oh...I see.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Forget I bothered you, then. I'll do my best to
forget too. Let's both agree to move on as we
were.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'd best be going, then. Goodbye, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
EEP!! <MYNAME>?! N-no, it's okay. I was just
thinking about you when all of a sudden you
were right there and--
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>AAH!! N-no, that's not what I meant! Well, yes it
is, but not really!!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Um, a-anyway! Do you, uh, have a little free time
right now?
<PAGE>
There's, um...something I want to tell you...
<PAGE>
B-but not here! I couldn't say it here. Can we go
somewhere else? Follow me. I mean...c-could
you follow me, please?

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_PATI>
...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Um, I'm sorry. I-I've never done this before, so I
don't really know how to start...
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Ummm...er... I-it sure is nice and sunny
today...augh! No! That's not what I want to talk
about. Ummmm....
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_R><FACE_LOVE><MYNAME>...! I, um....I-I...
<PAGE>
ITHINKI'MINLOVEWITHYOU!!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_R>So, um...c-could we, um...go out? Together?
Please?
I'd be happy to go out with you.
I'm sorry...

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R><ACTION_RIBBON>...
<PAGE>
W-wait, what? What did you just...huh? R-
really? You will?!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Ohmigosh! Ohmigosh! I'm so happy right now, I
think I could die!!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
So, uh...now that we're dating, what do we do
next?
<PAGE>
Maybe we could, um, give ourselves nicknames
or something. Although that could be kinda
embarrassing... What do you think?
Let's keep the same names.
I wanna change my name.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So...<BLUE><MYNAME></BLUE>, then?
Yes

<CANCEL_SELECT>
No

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Okay. ...<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>W-wow. Deliberately saying that out loud now
that we're b-boyfriend and girlfriend is
kinda...kinda...

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
I-I just remembered! I, um, left the teapot on!
I've got to hurry home right now! I'm sorry!!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
O-oh...Yeah, of course you wouldn't. Forget I
said anything, then. No, don't worry about me.
Let's stay friends, okay?

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
So, um...I-I just remembered I have stuff I have
to do. I'd better get going. Bye-bye, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow! <MYNAME>, do you have ESP?
<PAGE>
I was just thinking that I wanted to see you! See,
there's something super important I want to talk
to you about.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Let's go somewhere else. If we talk here,
somebody might walk up and interrupt us.
<PAGE>
Come with me.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_R><MYNAME>... I like you a whole lot.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_R>At first, I just really, really liked you as a friend,
but then I kept liking you even more.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>When I'm with you, my heart is so full of
happiness it feels like it could pop. I want to be
with you pretty much all the time.
<PAGE>
You've become a super-duper special person to
me, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
I'd really like it if we could go out together. I
want you to be my boyfriend. <RED>∀</RED>
Yes. I'll go out with you.
I'm sorry...

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R><ACTION_RIBBON>You will? Yay! Thank you so much! I'm really,
really, really happy now! <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Oh, I know! Since this is a super special
occasion, why don't we give each other new,
cute nicknames to commemorate it?
<PAGE>
I'd be really happy with whatever you want to
call me.
